title: Your favorite champs ult just went global.
body: {{champion:31}} Oh I'm gonna enjoy this feast.

replies.body: {{champion:412}} ????
The Box encircles the entire map. Completely useless, but *flashy as fuck*

{{champion:6}} _At base_

So.....whom shall I swap with?

Or should I say....

"Hello, I want to play a game......"

{{champion:34}} Sits at fountain all game and farms. The enemy team that is.

{{champion:38}} Use too much mana in lane? Teleport to fountain. Teleport back. Or to the bot lane for a double kill, then to back to mid lane. 

{{champion:10}} {{champion:117}} Global cockblack.

{{champion:29}} Suddenly fixing his ult so he can attack the nexus seems like a bad idea.

{{champion:45}} Thinking of this shouldn't make me giggle so much. 

{{champion:17}} Suddenly best support. Vision everywhere.
{{champion:16}} Grand.

{{champion:3}} Hehehe... Teemo ain't got nothin' on me.
{{champion:86}} Finally!
{{champion:64}} is the kick global, or is the target range global? because that makes all the difference...
{{champion:20}} well today just sucks for you...
{{champion:110}} Today's unique marksman has a global skillshot ultimate!
{{champion:29}} cross map pentakill! Now if only he could kill the nexus.
{{champion:33}} now has a global, all-structure damaging earthquake!
ohmygod

{{champion:98}}...Q_Q im already global...

 but what about extra global I shield everyone then split into five{{champion:98}}'s and then taunt everything :D

{{champion:103}} Kill everyone on every lane

{{champion:37}} Everybody dance!

{{champion:40}} 

So, Janna's top-tier disengage now shoves all enemies to the farthest reaches of the map, while healing her entire team. I like this idea.

{{champion:111}} Oh gods, where's it coming from? WHERE'S IT COMING FROM?!
{{champion:143}} The greatest garden. Also, Yasuo getting this treatment would probably need some new pants.
{{champion:61}}: Come, let us play together, under the spawn turret

What, you mean using her R just pulls everything on the map to her ball?

Rito balance. >.>

{{champion:41}} 

well dang...
{{champion:161}} Ever hear of a little place called Alderaan?

{{champion:1}} One heck of a tibbers was summoned
 {{champion:34}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:55}} Hi guys I'm karthus ult 2.0

{{champion:43}} 
So everyone on the map would just hear "Sae eleisa tera vi"...
{{champion:157}} SUPRISE BITCH

Lol just no deaths{{champion:26}}

{{champion:99}}  AHM FIRIN MAH LAZER!!
{{champion:268}}  "I say you all need a little time out.  To the corner with you!" *ults the enemy inside of their base and forces them there*

{{champion:75}} 

Now he can actually help lanes without missing farm.

{{champion:62}} global ult you say :3

{{champion:268}} 
Knock you up with my E and then Ult you into my fountain and trap you inside.
{{champion:9}}
Whatever you do, don't piss off {{champion:150}}
Don't wanna back? that's fine I'll bring the base to you and knock everyone away {{champion:40}}
Bard. FREEZE! {{champion:432}}

360 noscoped across the map m8

giant clone explodes on entire map
{{champion:120}} isnt even my favorite champ just it would look sooooooooooo cool
{{champion:30}} ahahahaha, bow before me mortals!
go kog maw build ap stay in base get penta

{{champion:245}} DID SOMEONE ORDER A NUKE?!
{{champion:26}} You fought my team once, now you fight them again.
{{champion:432}} *Happy trumpet noises*
{{champion:83}} 2 times the pain.
{{champion:50}} Step 1. Activate ult. Step 2. PENTAKILL!
{{champion:10}} We win.

{{champion:268}} go near enemy base behind their team, ult them into your own fountain.  Or trap them in their own base while you shove towers.

{{champion:25}} Not even flash can save you now...or if I am top lane I can ult for fights in bot lane without using my TP :D
{{champion:122}} from out of no where!!!
Imagine if this happened with URF.

{{champion:38}} catch me if you can
{{champion:82}} No escape
